pxchat.net.tcp
Class TCPServer

java.lang.Object
  pxchat.net.tcp.TCPServer

public class TCPServer
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements a non-blocking server using the TCP protocol. It accepts connecting clients and stores them in an internal list.

Author:
Markus DÃ¶llinger

Nested Class Summary
(package private)  class TCPServer.AcceptThread
          The accept thread waits until a new client connects and calls the callback method afterwards.
